Containers.Name: AlexaAppServer
Containers.Overview:
Alexa app server
Alexa app server
https://registry.hub.docker.com/u/mikehutchinson/alexa-app-server/ https://github.com/hutchy2570/unraid-alexa-app-server mikehutchinson/alexa-app-server https://github.com/hutchy2570/unraid-alexa-app-server true true
bridge
/mnt/user/appdata/AlexaAppServer/apps /opt/app/apps rw
/mnt/user/appdata/AlexaAppServer/public_html /opt/app/public_html rw
/mnt/user/appdata/AlexaAppServer/server /opt/app/server rw
http://[IP]:[PORT:8080]
